FuncDef: The reset isis peer command resets the neighbor relationship with a specified IS-IS neighbor. The reset isis peer command resets the neighbor relationship with a specified IS-IS neighbor.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the system ID of an IS-IS neighbor.
-

Specifies the IS-IS process ID of the neighbor with which the neighbor relationship needs to be reset.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the name of the VPN instance to which the IS-IS process belongs. For the default VPN instance, this parameter is optional.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
